item.description: The Moment It Clicks Creating Light: from Sunlight to Speedlights to HMIs http://www.cipne.org Joe McNally Monday, September 8, 2008 In this day-long seminar, internationally acclaimed, globetrotting, lighting expert Joe McNally will demonstrate using all types of light to create images with impact. Joe is an expert at using color and light and will share his ideas on using anything from sunlight to technically and logistically complex set ups. Listed as “One of the 100 Most Important People in Photography” this is one seminar not to be missed. Lighting legend Joe McNally comes to CIPNE to share his expert lighting techniques. Learn how Joe creates perfectly lit shots for Rolling Stone, Target, National Geographic, and Sports Illustrated and see why he is one of Nikon’s “Legends Behind the Lens.” Hilton Garden Inn 420 Totten Pond Rd. Waltham, MA 02451 Registration: 8:00–9:00am Program: 9:00am–5:00pm Cost: CIPNE Members, Free; Guests, $75; Full-time Students, $10. Pre-registration is required for this program. Click here to register (Non-members may pay by PayPal) Please note: on-line registration closes September 5th.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: CIPNE Event Joe McNally The Moment It Clicks Creating Light
